name: _Parasite
description:
Connect into your enemies and use them to your survival. This is _Parasite !

WASD to move

Left mouse to shoot

Space to dash / take control / self destruct

Dash  to the enemy who is marked to take control of it. 

When in control of an enemy dash again to drain charge from it and destroy it(the explosion do damage to enemies) . 

Your charge is used every second when not in control of an enemy. 

Dont let your charge hit zero, think like a _Parasite ;)

For the best performance i recommend downloading the game :d
